mapper.select: SELECT admin_name, last_login_at FROM nextjs_shop_admin WHERE admin_no = #{adminNo} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT admin_no, admin_id, password FROM nextjs_shop_admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_token(connect_ip, connect_agent, refresh_token, admin_no) VALUES(#{connectIp}, #{connectAgent}, #{refreshToken}, #{adminNo})
mapper.select: SELECT a.admin_id FROM nextjs_shop_token t JOIN nextjs_shop_admin a ON t.admin_no = a.admin_no WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken} AND connect_ip = #{connectIp} AND connect_agent = #{connectAgent} ORDER BY created_at DESC, token_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM nextjs_shop_seller ORDER BY requested_at DESC, seller_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_seller(seller_id,password,seller_name,seller_name_en,extension_number,mobile_number,email, business_registration_number,telecom_sales_number,representative_name, business_zipcode,business_address,business_address_detail, requested_at, approval_status, approved_at, approved_by) VALUES(#{s.sellerId},#{s.password},#{s.sellerName},#{s.sellerNameEn},#{s.extensionNumber},#{s.mobileNumber},#{s.email}, #{s.businessRegistrationNumber},#{s.telecomSalesNumber},#{s.representativeName}, #{s.businessZipcode},#{s.businessAddress},#{s.businessAddressDetail}, null, 'APPROVED', NOW(), #{adminNo})
